content:
Hi there!
I saw there was a 'release' of WAMR on 01-18-2022, but there were lots of commits since.
Is that the latest version considered stable? Or is one expected to use the latest master branch?
Thanks.

Hi, the version of 01-18-2022 is relatively stable, except several issues found in really corner cases. Nevertheless, we recommend you use the latest master branch, as there are more performance optimizations applied and more features added. We will create a new release soon after a thorough test. Thanks.
@Bamite The release of WAMR-05-18-2022 was created. Thanks.
